item.title: Buckets Method
item.description: The Buckets method is a variation of what’s called “Envelope Budgeting.” I didn’t invent this method. I don’t even consider it an invented thing. It just seems like a logical thing to do with money. You could do this with physical envelopes or the Buckets app. Steps In essence, you do this every month: Get a bucket Make it rain! Use it up Adjust Here’s each step in more detail.

item.title: Principles
item.description: Here are some guiding principles to help you budget well. How to do each of these is explored in more detail in other pages in this guide. 1. Give generously Your life will be better when you give some amount of money away. It doesn’t have to be much, but build charitable giving into your budget. 2. Live on last month’s income Spend this month what you earned last month. If you’re not able to do it yet, make it a goal.
